item.description:
Hey all,

In keeping with tradition, I'm scheduling my meet-ups at the LAST POSSIBLE MOMENT.

Still, I do hope you show up and climb, cause, ya know, you're awesome.

See you there!

Oh, and if you haven't been to Metro Rock before, you'll have to pass a belay test, yadda yadda, and they have gear to rent if you need it, etc., etc.
item.how_to_find_us: Have you seen me before? I look just like me, only more so. Also, i'll be wearing a dark blue t shirt with some ancient-looking Chinese characters on the back.
item.name: Last-minute-Wednesday MetroRock Madness!
